TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 6th Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: With a contrite soul we fall down before Thee, and we pray unto Thee, O Savior of the world: for Thou art the God of them that repent.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: When the Lord turned again the captivity of Sion.
When the Lord turned again the captivity of Sion.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Then was our mouth filled with joy.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Except the Lord build the house,
in vain do thy labour that build it.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Except the Lord guard the city, in vain doth he watch that guardeth her
